subject: Investing
title: Checklists for Investment Decisions
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Checklists for Investment Decisions.

hook.text: Surgeons cut errors by 35% using checklists. Investors can do the same before clicking 'buy.'

buildup.text: An investment checklist ensures you've verified valuation, risks, position size, and thesis before acting.

discovery.text: Checklists slow down System 1 and give System 2 time to verify that the decision makes sense.

twist.text: The checklist doesn't need to be long. Even five questions can catch most impulsive mistakes.

climax.text: Sample: Is it within my allocation? Have I read the bear case? Am I acting on emotion or analysis?

punchline.text: A simple checklist turns gut feelings into grounded decisions.

quiz.question: Why are investment checklists effective?
options: They slow impulsive decisions and ensure analysis
